import React from 'react'; import './Tiket.css'; // Assuming styling is in Tiket.css const concerts = [ { id: 1, artist: "Ed-Sheeran", location: "Medan", date: "20 Oct 2024", time: "19.00 - 21.00", price: "Rp.25.000.000,00", image: "./image/ed.jpg", // replace with your correct image path }, { id: 2, artist: "Avanged Sevenfold", location: "Jakarta", date: "22 Mei 2025", time: "20.00 - 22.00", price: "Rp.30.000.000,00", image: "./image/a7x.jpg", // replace with your correct image path }, { id: 3, artist: "Bruno Mars", location: "Surabaya", date: "5 Nov 2024", time: "19.00 - 21.00", price: "Rp.25.000.000,00", image: "./image/Bruno Mars.jpeg", // replace with your correct image path }, { id: 4, artist: "Linkin Park", location: "Medan", date: "11 Nov 2024", time: "19.00 - 22.00", price: "Rp.10.000.000,00", image: "./image/adele.jpeg", }, { id: 5, artist: "Adele", location: "Jawa Tengah", date: "1 Nov 2024", time: "18.00 - 21.00", price: "Rp.5.000.000,00", image: "./image/linkinpark.jpeg", }, ]; function Tiket() { return (
{/* Assuming your logo */}
  • Home
  • Histori
  • Tiket
{concerts.map((concert) => (

{concert.artist}

{concert.location}, {concert.date}

{concert.time}

{concert.price}

))}
); } export default Tiket;
